Hi all
Do we have a way out by which we can test the same API with a 
different set of inputs.(inputs to be picked up from a text file)
I am looking for an alternative to creating a new testSCENARIO() 
method for each scene.

test_CORRECT_DATA()
test_INVALID_DATA()

Both of these are going to perform the same stuff internally.

Do we have a way by which we can specify.. run this testMethod() 10 
times, this one 5 times.

Thanks
Rajneesh
